tool_description: inboxes.com temp email accounts for testing and automation
name: inboxes.com
title: inboxes.com

api_list.name: ActivateInbox
api_list.description: Activate a single inbox (email address) and wait for messages
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://inboxes-com.p.rapidapi.com/inboxes/me@getnada.com"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "inboxes-com.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://inboxes-com.p.rapidapi.com/inboxes/{inboxid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "inboxes-com.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
